text: @albamonica @MSNBC Why is Trump, the boss of Pence, telling ‘his people’ to slow down. the Covid19 tests? Does he want to slow down health care during this pandemics? Pence says one thing & Trump says another. Our nation’s top 2 leaders, aren’t they confused and mixed up?
